prompt:
You find yourself in the bustling city of Mumbai, India, in the year 3050. The streets are filled with hovercars whizzing by, neon signs lighting up the night sky, and robots mingling with humans. As you navigate through the crowded streets, you notice a group of rebels called the Cybernetic Resistance movement, fighting against the oppressive government that controls the cybernetic enhancements of its citizens.

Suddenly, a member of the Cybernetic Resistance approaches you, their cybernetic eye sparkling with determination. They hand you a futuristic looking device and whisper, "You have been chosen to join our cause. Use this Quantum Phase Shifter to help us break into the government's mainframe and free our people from their control." With that, they disappear into the shadows.

As you hold the Quantum Phase Shifter in your hand, you can't help but feel a surge of adrenaline. Will you join the Cybernetic Resistance and fight against the government, or will you turn your back on them and go about your way in this futuristic world?
1. Join the Cybernetic Resistance movement.
2. Ignore the device and continue on your way.
